pageTitle: Diffuser for the Metz Mecablitz 44 AF-1 Digital Flash: Samsung Talk Forum: Digital Photography Review
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {5510=I own a Metz 44 AF-1 Flash for my NX300 and just picked up this Diffuser for the unit. It fits precisely on the flash, not too tight and not too loose. Just look for eBay item number: 251285688640. I am not selling anything just wanted to pass along this recommendation. The unit comes from Shenzhen, China. Bought mine on October 28 and received it today, November 7th. I paid under $10 USD and the shipping was free. I live in Wisconsin USA. I really love this flash for my purposes.}
